name: Legion Genesis
description: The Origin Legions of Bridgeworld with a fixed supply.

name: Smol Brains
description: The Smol Brains are a dynamic PFP of a monkey whose head gets bigger the larger its IQ becomes.

name: Seed of Life
description: Built atop the Magic ecosystem, Life embodies the metaverse as a living breathing ecosystem...

name: Legion Auxiliary
description: Descendants of Genesis Legions that can be summoned in Bridgeworld.

name: Treasures
description: Treasures are composable building blocks in Bridgeworld that will be used inter- and intra-metaverse.

name: Consumables
description: Functional items that are crafted from Treasures and give utility in the Metaverse.

name: Smol Bodies
description: The Smol Bodies inhabit a gym near you, stacking $plates to earn muscle and be not smol.

name: Smithonia Weapons
description: Smithonia is a SmithyDAO project. It's a world of staking and adventure which supports a hybrid economy where the primary objective of the game is to build the rarity of your weapon through gameplay.

name: Tales of Elleria
description: Tales of Elleria is an immersive three-dimensional role-playing GameFi project. Summon heroes, take on assignments, go on quests and epic adventures to battle dangerous monsters earn tremendous rewards.

name: Peek-A-Boo
description: Peek-A-Boo is a collection of 10,000 adorable NFTs. There are two types, Ghosts and Busters.

name: Realm
description: Realm is a decentralized world-building experience. Enjoy $MAGIC emissions and Loot from across the Metaverse.

name: Smol Brains Pets
description: The Smol Brains Pets are cute companions to accompany your Smol Brain in Smolverse.

name: Smol Cars
description: The Smol Cars are here to get you around in Smolverse. Vroom vroom.

name: Smol Treasures
description: Smols and Swols are currently farming Smol treasures on the moon.
